name: Alien Escape (itch) (LukyDev42)
description: This is a 1rst Year University project. It's a bullet hell shooter with a top down view. You play as the unnamed Space marine (it's not an among us crew mate) in your way out of a spaceship that has been invaded by aliens. You can try to speed run the game, the current best is 03:03.50 If you beat it, you can post it in the comments. Good luck and enjoy the game.
